summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2442, for the improvement of the alley in block 56, Terry's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley from Cherry Street to Columbia Street, and between 7th and 8th Avenues, by leveling the grade and planking with plank 4 inches thick; under Ordinance No. 26025 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
